definition.name: terraform-new-workspace
definition.description: Creates a new Terraform workspace. If the workspace already exists, succeeds without doing anything.
definition.author: Daniel Flook

inputs.name: path
inputs.description: The path to the Terraform root module directory.

inputs.name: workspace
inputs.description: The name of the Terraform workspace to create.

inputs.name: backend_config
inputs.description: List of Terraform backend config values, one per line.

inputs.name: backend_config_file
inputs.description:
List of Terraform backend config files to use, one per line.
Paths should be relative to the GitHub Actions workspace
